title: "Network Warning - You Have Been Disconnected" but internet connection is fine
body: After seeing the loading screen for my game- I got this message: "Network Warning - You  have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again." (see link). My internet was not the problem- I was able to load web pages (writing this as I try to reconnect), I was able to log out and back in to the client, but every time I hit "Reconnect", I got this message and could not connect.  Any clue what is happening? I was playing last night no problem, and I haven't patched since then.

replies.body: Did you ever find a fix for this? I know the post is older, but I have found myself with the same issue and have gone through many lengths to try and restore my ability the play the game without success. I D/C'd right out of a game, was unable to connect to any games afterwards, and have been in contact with RIOT support for almost a week now without any resolution.

It looks like your client is having a bit of problem getting connected to our game servers specifically. Sometimes it's due to some awkward [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) even if everything else with your internet is running smoothly. Make sure to double check the steps in that guide, and let me know if nothing seems to be helping.
